title: BitContractor
blurb: Milestone-based Bitcoin contracting: specs, PSBT escrows, attestations, and auditable payouts.
description: BitContractor turns contracts into reproducible workflows. Project owners define milestones with objective acceptance tests; funds are locked into non-custodial multisig PSBT escrows; delivery artifacts are hashed and attested; and payouts release when criteria are verifiably met. Optional DLC/oracle clauses encode measurable outcomes. Everything is exportable: specs, signatures, transactions, and policy files for independent review.
